title: FSIB selects IFCI MD as SIDBI head, Sanjay Shukla for NHB MD
description: The Financial Services Institutions Bureau (FSIB) has recommended Manoj Mittal as the Chairman and Managing Director of Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) and Sanjay Shukla as the Managing Director of National Housing Bank (NHB). Mittal will replace S Ramann, who joined SIDBI in April 2021. FSIB interviewed 21 candidates and recommended Mittal for the position.
